Race Packages

PLEASE NOTE: All drivers require a Balacalava for hygeine reasons. Feel free to bring your own, or we can supply them for £1.50 each.

Endurance Events

Endurance racing is a fantastic team building or stag & hen party event. It is a multi lap event which can be run as individuals or teams. These events are run on our 200cc corporate karts. They start with the Dash 30 minute Race going up to the 60 minute Super Challenge race.

All Endurance Events Include:

  • Use of the Corporate racewear
  • 5 Lap practice/qualifying session
  • Full race report including overall results and individual reports
  • Trophies for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place
  • Bottle of bubbly for the winner

  • Dash

    30 Minute Non-Stop Race

    £32.50 per driver8-10 drivers

  • Dash Plus

    40 Minute Non-Stop Race

    £37.50 per driver8-10 drivers

  • Challenge

    50 Minutes Non-Stop or 2 x 25 Minute Races

    £42.50 per driver8-10 drivers

  • Super Challenge

    60 Minutes Non-Stop or 2 x 30 Minute Races

    £47.50 per driver8-10 drivers

  • Double Endurance Races

    If you have 16 or more drivers, why not double up any of the above packages? Race in teams of two for double the overall time, at the same cost per driver!

Grand Prix Events

This event is set for medium/large groups intent on a good nights’ racing, and offers the ultimate karting experience. Groups will have exclusive use of the facilities for the duration of the event.

Grand Prix heat stages allow every driver to start one race from each position in the grid.

All Grand Prix Events Include:

  • Trophies for 1st, 2nd and 3rd place
  • Bottle of bubbly for the winner

  • Grand Prix

    4 Lap Practice Session

    6 x 6 Lap Heats Per Driver

    8 Lap Final Race For Top 8 Drivers

    £37.50 per driver13+ drivers

  • Super Prix

    6 Lap Practice Session

    6 x 6 Lap Heats Per Driver

    8 Lap Semi Final For All Drivers

    8 Lap Grand Final For Top 16 Drivers

    £42.50 per driver13+ drivers

Sign up to receive the latest news, offers and discounts

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Sodi karts for corporate, group parties and arrive & drive sessions. We also have Cadet karts for juniors.

  • Stoke On Trent
  • Staffordshire
